ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... More that the well balanced is horrifically overpriced. Try selling one back to a vendor for a more realistic idea of it s true value. Everyone I know who
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Jul 26/99, Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...> wrote:

> Personally I feel the Dirk is sold for WAY under it true value,
> considering the WB Rapier sells for 225 plat.

More that the well balanced is horrifically overpriced. Try selling one
back to a vendor for a more realistic idea of it's true value. Everyone
I know who has bought a well balanced weapon regrets it and tells anyone
who will listen not to make the same mistake.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
